comment: Alternate definition of class membership: a class ` X ` is an element of another class ` A ` iff there is an element of ` A ` equal to ` X ` . (Contributed by AV, 13-Nov-2020.) Remove use of ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , and ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 19-May-2023.)
